body: Some oracles seek meaning in the pattern of the stars across the night sky, the trails of comets, and the eternal orbits of the planets.
name: Stargazer

sections.body: dark tapestry, heavens, lore, nature, time.
sections.name: Recommended Mysteries

sections.body: A stargazer adds Knowledge (nature), Perception, and Survival to her list of class skills. These replace the additional class skills from her mystery.
sections.name: Class Skills

sections.body: faerie fire (2nd), glitterdust (4th), guiding star (6th), wandering star motes (8th), meteor swarm (18th). These bonus spells replace the oracle's mystery bonus spells at these levels.
sections.name: Bonus Spells

sections.body: A stargazer must take the following revelations at the listed levels.
As the heavens mystery revelation. You must take this revelation at 1st level.
